content: Now to Q1 performance, the Dollar Tree banner delivered a strongest quarter in company history among the highlights an 11.2% comp the best quarterly comp performance in more than 20 years, which is including our largest sales day ever, which was the day – the Saturday before Easter, a 46 – a 40.6% gross profit margin nearly 700 basis points above the prior year’s quarter and a company record 20.2% operating margin more than 800 basis points over Q1 of last year.
